verse.name: v1
verse.lines: O little town of Bethlehem, newline How still we see thee lie; newline Above thy deep and dreamless sleep, newline The silent stars go by. newline Yet in thy dark streets shineth newline The everlasting Light; newline The hopes and fears of all the years, newline Are met in thee tonight.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: For Christ is born of Mary newline And gathered all above; newline While mortals sleep the angels keep newline Their watch of wondering love. newline O, morning stars together newline Proclaim the holy birth; newline And praises sing to God the King newline And peace to men on earth.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: How silently, how silently, newline The wondrous gift is giv'n; newline So God imparts to human hearts, newline The blessings of His heaven. newline No ear may hear His coming, newline But in this world of sin; newline Where meek souls will newline Receive Him still, newline The dear Christ enters in.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: O, holy child of Bethlehem, newline Descend to us we pray; newline Cast out our sin and enter in, newline Be born in us today. newline We hear the Christmas angels, newline The great glad tidings tell; newline O, come to us abide with us, newline Our Lord, Emmanuel.
